Languages.Language 1: Understands the languages of its creator but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 20 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Sword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 23 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Golem makes 2 Melee attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Poison Breath, The Golem exhales a poisonous gas in a cone, each creature caught in the area take an Average 45 Poison damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Fire Absorption, The Golem absorbs fire damage and heals from it
Abilities.Ability 2: Immutable Form, The Golem is immune to spells that would alter its form
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Weapons, The Golem's weapon attacks are magical

Damage Immunities.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with Adamantine weapons
